message:
Egypt on the Surveillance Industry Index

https://sii.transparencytoolkit.org/search?action=index&controller=search&goods_facet=Deep+packet+inspection&page=1&recipient_country_facet=Egypt

A fresh article about the same topic
https://www.buzzfeed.com/sheerafrenkel/egypt-begins-surveillance-of-facebook-twitter-and-skype-on-u?utm_term=.wnKKKZbeq#.gfx55yMWB

data.message: yes, it is good that this is happening and immoral acts are being tracked and punished, not to mention terrorist threats.  I would say this is a big step forward. So thank Allah we don't have Grindr Egypt
